EmailTemplate.name: 202005_Amer_BGA_West_Operators-Mechanics-Avionics_Webinar.Sorry-we-missed-you_Vi
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Did you miss our Virtual Operator Conference, West Coast? Sorry we missed you, {{lead.First Name:default=customer}}!
Since you couldn’t make our Virtual Operator Conference, West Coast, it’s now on-demand <[[https://watch.honeywell.com/watch/yP6vzWAPVahyRhTcxoMo8s]]>, should you like to view it. Please use code 987654.
Stay in the loop with us and you’ll be among the first to learn about upcoming webinars, events, product launches and more. Sign up here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]>.
We look forward to seeing you next time!
Thank you, Honeywell Aerospace WATCH NOW <[[https://watch.honeywell.com/watch/yP6vzWAPVahyRhTcxoMo8s]]>
